I’m going to keep fighting for my Essential Workers Bill of Rights, & @SenatorBaldwin & @SenDuckworth’s bill to make @OSHA_DOL issue an ETS for COVID-19. But @USDOL already has power right now to help protect American workers. @DOLOIG should explain why they’re failing to use it.

@USDOL should have issued an OSHA Emergency Temporary Standard for COVID-19 months ago – enforceable workplace safety rules for the pandemic. It refused. Workers are dying from COVID-19 & @OSHA_DOL claims emergency safety standards to protect workers wouldn’t help. Unbelievable.

COVID-19 is clearly a grave danger to workers’ health. So it’s mind-boggling that @OSHA_DOL’s inspections & citations plummeted in the crisis. I’ve requested @DOLOIG investigate whether OSHA failed to meet its legal requirement to protect workplace safety. https://www.huffpost.com/entry/senate-democrats-audit-osha-coronavirus_n_5ecf13afc5b61b971d4e47fe
